annotation: This short saying is a pun on the word "call," which can be used both to describe the call of a shepherd (or any other type of call) and a particular type of paid office, here the benefice of a minister. Jens delights in many of his stories in puns, double entendres, and other verbal dexterity. The statement also acts as a humorous lead-in to the next story.
danish_manuscript:
I Rold var deres Hjordekald bedre end deres
Præstekald.
english_manuscript: In Rold, their shepherd's call was better than their minister's call.
danish_publication: I Rold var deres hyrdekald bedre end deres præstekald.
english_publication: In Rold their sphepherd's call was better than their minister's call [benefice].
